response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand its importance and would like to extend an offer to make it accessible to you. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, I propose a price of $950,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. I believe this is a mutually beneficial opportunity, and I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
